body: `It seems you're changing the contract of the public ` I am sorry I didn't get you. Regarding reasonable, `InputStream ` owns resources that must be explicitly freed by invoking `is.close()` and yes the creator of the `InputStream` be responsible for closing it.
body_html: It seems you're changing the contract of the public I am sorry I didn't get you. Regarding reasonable, InputStream owns resources that must be explicitly freed by invoking is.close() and yes the creator of the InputStream be responsible for closing it.
body_text: It seems you're changing the contract of the public  I am sorry I didn't get you. Regarding reasonable, InputStream  owns resources that must be explicitly freed by invoking is.close() and yes the creator of the InputStream be responsible for closing it.
